title: 76 - LIVE Questions - Mike Pence And The Billy Graham Rule - April 6 2017
description:
VOX Podcast Facebook LIVE Q&A - April 6 2017

What is your take on the Mike Pence reference to the Billy Graham rule in his political and personal life?

- Mike Erre
